root.Summary: 1: Ludigs K, Seguín-Estévez Q, Lemeille S, Ferrero I, Rota G, Chelbi S, Mattmann C, MacDonald HR, Reith W, Guarda G. NLRC5 exclusively transactivates MHC class I and related genes through a distinctive SXY module.
